ygData.subject: Re: The worth of a Wizard (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that the gate spells are well placed. Some are gating to safe places and close to cities. Other s are gating to not so safe places near dungeons and
ygData.messageBody:
I think that the gate spells are well placed. Some are gating to 'safe'
places and close to cities. Other's are gating to not so safe places near
dungeons and adventure zones. Just last night I travelled all the continents
within the a span of 30 minutes (getting various stuff) and found it well
worth it. Gates to our guilds within the city itself would have been a good
idea I think. But other than that I'm not too worried about the gate stuff.

Druids btw, are supposed to be the masters of travel.

Zalbar The Mad
20th Wizard
Solusek Ro
